hero.headline: Licensed Electricians You Can Trust
hero.subheadline: 24/7 Emergency Service • Residential & Commercial • Free Safety Inspections

about.title: Powering Austin Safely Since 2005
about.text: VoltPro Electric is a family-owned company committed to electrical safety and excellence. Our master electricians are fully licensed, bonded, and insured. We specialize in everything from panel upgrades and EV charger installations to complete commercial rewiring. When it comes to electricity, don't take chances - trust the pros.

services.name: Emergency Repairs
services.description: Electrical emergencies don't wait, and neither do we. 24/7 response for outages, sparks, and hazards.

services.name: Panel Upgrades
services.description: Modern homes need modern power. Upgrade your panel to handle today's electrical demands safely.

services.name: EV Charger Installation
services.description: Level 2 charger installation for all electric vehicle makes. Charge faster at home.

services.name: Safety Inspections
services.description: Comprehensive electrical inspections for home buyers, sellers, and peace of mind.

testimonials.name: Amanda K.
testimonials.content: Our power went out at 2am with a newborn at home. They arrived in 45 minutes and fixed the issue. Lifesavers!

testimonials.name: Tom B.
testimonials.content: Installed our Tesla charger in one day. Clean work, fair price, and they explained everything clearly.

testimonials.name: Sandra W.
testimonials.content: Found serious issues during our home inspection that the seller's electrician missed. Thorough and honest.
